member.name: T:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.AudioChannels
member.summary: Defines the number of channels in the audio data.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.AudioChannels.Mono
member.summary: Indicates audio data is contained in one channel.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.AudioChannels.Stereo
member.summary: Indicates audio data contains two channels.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.AudioFormat
member.summary: Provides specific technical information about an audio format that is used by audio capture devices.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.AudioFormat.BitsPerSample
member.summary: Gets the number of bits that are used to store the audio information for a single sample of an audio format.
member.returns: The number of bits that are used to store the audio information for a single sample of an audio format.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.AudioFormat.Channels
member.summary: Gets the number of channels that are provided by the audio format.
member.returns: The number of channels that are provided by the audio format.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.AudioFormat.SamplesPerSecond
member.summary: Gets the number of samples per second that are provided by the audio format.
member.returns: The number of samples per second that are provided by the audio format.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.AudioFormat.WaveFormat
member.summary: Gets the encoding format of the audio format as a value.
member.returns: The encoding format of the audio format.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.SoundEffect
member.summary: Provides a loaded sound resource. You can play multiple instances of the by calling .

member.name: M:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.SoundEffect.#ctor(System.Byte[],System.Int32,Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.AudioChannels)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of based on an audio buffer, sample rate, and number of audio channels.
member.param: Buffer that contains the audio data. The audio format must be PCM wave data.
Sample rate, in Hertz (Hz), of audio data.
Number of channels (mono or stereo) of audio data.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.SoundEffect.#ctor(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.AudioChannels,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of with specified parameters such as audio sample rate, channels, looping criteria, and a buffer to hold the audio.
member.param: Buffer that contains the audio data. The audio format must be PCM wave data.
Offset, in bytes, to the starting position of the audio data.
Amount, in bytes, of audio data.
Sample rate, in Hertz (Hz), of audio data.
Number of channels (mono or stereo) of audio data.

member.summary: Creates a new for this .
member.returns: A new for this .

member.summary: Releases the resources used by the .

member.summary: Gets the length of time of the .
member.returns: The duration of the .

member.name: M:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.SoundEffect.FromStream(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Creates a object based on the specified data stream.
member.returns: A object based on the specified data stream.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.SoundEffect.GetSampleDuration(System.Int32,System.Int32,Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.AudioChannels)
member.summary: Returns the sample duration based on the specified sample size and sample rate.
member.returns: The calculated sample duration.
member.param: Size, in bytes, of audio data.
Sample rate, in Hertz (Hz), of audio content. The must be between 8000 Hz and 48000 Hz.
Number of channels in the audio data.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.SoundEffect.GetSampleSizeInBytes(System.TimeSpan,System.Int32,Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.AudioChannels)
member.summary: Returns the size of the audio sample based on duration, sample rate, and audio channels.
member.returns: Size, in bytes, of audio sample.
member.param: Sample rate, in Hertz (Hz), of audio content. The parameter must be between 8,000 Hz and 48,000 Hz.
Number of channels in the audio data.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.SoundEffect.IsDisposed
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the object is disposed.
member.returns: true if the object is disposed; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.SoundEffect.MasterVolume
member.summary: Gets or sets the master volume that affects all sounds.
member.returns: Volume, ranging from 0.0f (silence) to 1.0f (current device volume). 1.0f is full volume relative to the current device volume.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.SoundEffect.Play
member.summary: Plays a sound.
member.returns: true if the sound is playing back successfully; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.SoundEffect.Play(System.Single,System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Plays a sound based on specified volume, pitch, and panning.
member.returns: true if the sound is playing back successfully; otherwise, false.
member.param: Volume, ranging from 0.0f (silence) to 1.0f (full volume). 1.0f is full volume relative to .
Pitch adjustment, ranging from -1.0f (down one octave) to 1.0f (up one octave). 0.0f is unity (normal) pitch.
Panning, ranging from -1.0f (full left) to 1.0f (full right). 0.0f is centered.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.SoundEffectInstance
member.summary: Provides a single playing, paused, or stopped instance of a sound.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.SoundEffectInstance.Dispose
member.summary: Releases unmanaged resources held by this .

member.name: M:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.SoundEffectInstance.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Releases the unmanaged resources held by this , and optionally releases the managed resources.
member.param: Specify true to release both the managed and unmanaged resources for this . Specify false to release only the unmanaged resources.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.SoundEffectInstance.IsDisposed
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the object is disposed.
member.returns: true if the object is disposed; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.SoundEffectInstance.IsLooped
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether looping is enabled for the .
member.returns: true if the has looping enabled; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.SoundEffectInstance.Pan
member.summary: Gets or sets the panning for the .
member.returns: Panning, ranging from -1.0f (full left) to 1.0f (full right). 0.0f is centered.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.SoundEffectInstance.Pause
member.summary: Pauses the .

member.name: P:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.SoundEffectInstance.Pitch
member.summary: Gets or sets the pitch adjustment for the .
member.returns: Pitch adjustment, ranging from -1.0f (down one octave) to 1.0f (up one octave). 0.0f is unity (normal) pitch.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.SoundEffectInstance.Play
member.summary: Plays or resumes playing the .

member.name: M:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.SoundEffectInstance.Resume
member.summary: Resumes playback of the .

member.name: P:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.SoundEffectInstance.State
member.summary: Gets the current state (playing, paused, or stopped) of the .
member.returns: The current state of the .

member.name: M:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.SoundEffectInstance.Stop
member.summary: Immediately stops playing the .

member.name: M:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.SoundEffectInstance.Stop(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Stops playing a immediately or as authored.
member.param: Specifies whether to stop playing immediately, or to break out of the loop region and play the release. Specify true to stop playing immediately, or false to break out of the loop region and play the release phase (the remainder of the sound).

member.name: P:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.SoundEffectInstance.Volume
member.summary: Gets or sets the volume of the .
member.returns: Volume, ranging from 0.0f (silence) to 1.0f (full volume). 1.0f is full volume relative to .

member.name: F:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Audio.WaveFormatType.Pcm
